languages.text: {n}Вокс Паскаля сварливо каркает:{/n} "Как технопровидец корабля я принимаю заключение технического дознания. Как просвещенный служитель Омниссии — усомняюсь в нем. Паттерны сбоев складываются в более сложную картину, чем видится служителям более низкого звена. Посему было отдано распоряжение сообщать о новых инцидентах персонально данной единице".

{n}Pasqal's vox crackles peevishly:{/n} "As a ship's Enginseer, I accept the results of the technical enquiry. As a learned servant of the Omnissiah — I question its findings. The patterns of the malfunctions form a more complex picture than can be discerned by those of lower ranks. For this reason, instructions have been issued across the ship to report any new incidents to me personally."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля сварливо каркает:{/n} "Как технопровидец корабля я принимаю заключение технического дознания. Как просвещенный служитель Омниссии — усомняюсь в нем. languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite un chasquido de irritación.{/n} «Como visioingeniero de a bordo, acepto los resultados de la consulta técnica. Como docto siervo del Omnissiah, cuestiono sus conclusiones. Los patrones de las averías conforman un todo más complejo que puede ser discernido por individuos de categoría inferior. Por este motivo, se ha dado instrucciones a toda la tripulación de la nave para que me informen personalmente de cualquier incidencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles peevishly:{/n} "As a ship's Enginseer, I accept the results of the technical enquiry. As a learned servant of the Omnissiah — I question its findings. The patterns of the malfunctions form a more complex picture than can be discerned by those of lower ranks. For this reason, instructions have been issued across the ship to report any new incidents to me personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite un chasquido de irritación.{/n} «Como visioingeniero de a bordo, acepto los resultados de la consulta técnica. Como docto siervo del Omnissiah, cuestiono sus conclusiones. Los patrones de las averías conforman un todo más complejo que puede ser discernido por individuos de categoría inferior. Por este motivo, se ha dado instrucciones a toda la tripulación de la nave para que me informen personalmente de cualquier incidencia».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが不機嫌そうに音を鳴らす。{/n}「船の機関整備師として、技術的な調査を受け入れる。万機神に仕える者として、この調査結果に疑問を抱かざるをえない。故障のパターンは下層階級の者には判別できないほど複雑だ。このため、新たな事態が発生した場合は私個人に報告するよう、船内全体に指示が出されている」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles peevishly:{/n} "As a ship's Enginseer, I accept the results of the technical enquiry. As a learned servant of the Omnissiah — I question its findings. The patterns of the malfunctions form a more complex picture than can be discerned by those of lower ranks. For this reason, instructions have been issued across the ship to report any new incidents to me personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが不機嫌そうに音を鳴らす。{/n}「船の機関整備師として、技術的な調査を受け入れる。万機神に仕える者として、この調査結果に疑問を抱かざるをえない。故障のパターンは下層階級の者には判別できないほど複雑だ。このため、新たな事態が発生した場合は私個人に報告するよう、船内全体に指示が出されている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置发出了急躁的噼啪声。{/n}“作为船上的引擎先知，我接受技术调查的结果，但身为博学多闻的欧姆尼塞亚之仆，我质疑它的结论。通过故障的模式所拼凑出的复杂图景，远超出了那些下级人员的分辨能力。因此，我已经在船上下达指示，任何新的事件都要向我个人报告。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles peevishly:{/n} "As a ship's Enginseer, I accept the results of the technical enquiry. As a learned servant of the Omnissiah — I question its findings. The patterns of the malfunctions form a more complex picture than can be discerned by those of lower ranks. For this reason, instructions have been issued across the ship to report any new incidents to me personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置发出了急躁的噼啪声。{/n}“作为船上的引擎先知，我接受技术调查的结果，但身为博学多闻的欧姆尼塞亚之仆，我质疑它的结论。通过故障的模式所拼凑出的复杂图景，远超出了那些下级人员的分辨能力。因此，我已经在船上下达指示，任何新的事件都要向我个人报告。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal crépite hargneusement.{/n} « En tant que technaugure, j'accepte le résultat de l'enquête technique. En tant que serviteur éclairé de l'Omnimessie, je conteste ses conclusions. Les dysfonctionnements forment un tableau plus complexe qui ne peut être perçu par les individus de rang inférieur. En conséquence, ordre a été donné aux occupants du vaisseau de me signaler personnellement tout nouvel incident. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles peevishly:{/n} "As a ship's Enginseer, I accept the results of the technical enquiry. As a learned servant of the Omnissiah — I question its findings. The patterns of the malfunctions form a more complex picture than can be discerned by those of lower ranks. For this reason, instructions have been issued across the ship to report any new incidents to me personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal crépite hargneusement.{/n} « En tant que technaugure, j'accepte le résultat de l'enquête technique. En tant que serviteur éclairé de l'Omnimessie, je conteste ses conclusions. Les dysfonctionnements forment un tableau plus complexe qui ne peut être perçu par les individus de rang inférieur. En conséquence, ordre a été donné aux occupants du vaisseau de me signaler personnellement tout nouvel incident. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Vox knistert mürrisch:{/n} "Als Maschinenseher eines Schiffs akzeptiere ich das Resultat der technischen Abfrage. Als gelehrter Diener des Omnissiah zweifle ich ihr Ergebnis an. Die Muster der Fehlfunktionen zeichnen ein sehr viel komplexeres Bild als es jene von niederem Rang erkennen können. Es wurde daher dem gesamten Schiff Anweisung erteilt, neue Zwischenfälle an mich persönlich zu melden."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles peevishly:{/n} "As a ship's Enginseer, I accept the results of the technical enquiry. As a learned servant of the Omnissiah — I question its findings. The patterns of the malfunctions form a more complex picture than can be discerned by those of lower ranks. For this reason, instructions have been issued across the ship to report any new incidents to me personally."

Als gelehrter Diener des Omnissiah zweifle ich ihr Ergebnis an. Die Muster der Fehlfunktionen zeichnen ein sehr viel komplexeres Bild als es jene von niederem Rang erkennen können. Es wurde daher dem gesamten Schiff Anweisung erteilt, neue Zwischenfälle an mich persönlich zu melden."

For this reason, instructions have been issued across the ship to report any new incidents to me personally."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan hırçın tıkırtılar yükseliyor.{/n} "Gemi Mühedyum'u olarak teknik değerlendirmenin sonuçlarını kabul etmekteyim. Hermesih'in bilgi sahibi bir hizmetkârı olarak bu bulguları sorguluyorum. Yaşanan arızaların oluşturduğu kalıplar, aşağı mertebelerdekilerin ayırt edemeyebileceği kadar kompleks bir resim çizmekte. Bu sebeple de gemide meydana gelebilecek tüm yeni olayların bizzat bana raporlanması talimatını yayınladım."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles peevishly:{/n} "As a ship's Enginseer, I accept the results of the technical enquiry. As a learned servant of the Omnissiah — I question its findings. The patterns of the malfunctions form a more complex picture than can be discerned by those of lower ranks. For this reason, instructions have been issued across the ship to report any new incidents to me personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan hırçın tıkırtılar yükseliyor.{/n} "Geminin Mühedyum'u olarak teknik değerlendirmenin sonuçlarını kabul etmekteyim. Hermesih'in bilgi sahibi bir hizmetkârı olarak bu bulguları sorguluyorum. Yaşanan arızaların oluşturduğu kalıplar, aşağı mertebelerde olanların ayırt edemeyebileceği kadar kompleks bir resim çizmekte. Bu sebeple de gemide meydana gelebilecek tüm yeni olayların bizzat bana raporlanması talimatını yayınladım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
